description: This file defines the LibraryScreen widget and related UI components for displaying a user's audiobook library in a Flutter app. It includes logic to display either a list of audiobooks or an empty state message.

classes.name: LibraryScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of audiobooks from the app's library or an empty state if no audiobooks are present.

classes.name: _EmptyLibrary
classes.description: A widget that shows a message and encouragement when the user's audiobook library is empty.

classes.name: _LibraryTile
classes.description: A widget representing an individual audiobook entry in the library list, displaying cover art, title, author, and navigation icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the LibraryScreen or its subclasses, rendering the library list or empty state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the empty library message UI.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds each individual audiobook list tile.
